Oh, the blessed Saviour stands by many whose eyes are so blinded by tears that they do not discern Him. He longs 
                                                                           258
to clasp our hands firmly, while we cling to Him in simple faith, imploring Him to guide us. It is our privilege to rejoice in God. If we will let the comfort and peace of Jesus into our lives, we shall be kept close to His great heart of love.--The Review and Herald, Nov. 25, 1884.
